comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Miss Linda A. Arnold was a society beauty who married in 1913, to Marquis Maximillian Strozzi of Florence, at a ceremony in Providence RI. Her father was Olney Arnold (1861-1916), the US Consul General at Cairo. history.state.gov/departmenthistory/people/arnold-olney query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9400E0D8103BE633A... Here's her husband: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3477967437/]

comment.author: 109451555@N04
comment._content: she is my grand grand mother!!! what a surprise to find her here!! thank you for collecting all these beautiful photos! keep going!
